items.sentence: I didn\'t know whether Tom wanted to go to Boston with me or not.
I think it would be a good idea for you to go to Boston with Tom.
I\'ve asked Tom to take care of my children while I\'m in Boston.
It won\'t be easy to find someone capable of taking Tom\'s place.
Tom\'s grandfather on his mother\'s side has already passed away.
The laundry that I hung up was on the clothesline for three days.
Tom tried to catch the ball with his left hand, but he couldn\'t.
I\'ve been drinking a lot more coffee recently than I usually do.
I asked Tom if he knew anyone who could teach my children French.
Tom and Mary have been working together for the last three years.
